GSP28jsbh2-2u:1574_1: prayājaśeṣavākye vibhaktyorlakṣaṇāyāścāṅgīkārāt ihāpi tasyā aduṣṭatvamapinā sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1576: yadi tu pāṭhasya nidhanākhyadvārasaṃbandhena kṛtārthatvānna nityanaimittikaprayoge śrutikalpakatvamiti tatprayoge hīṣādyaprāptistadavasthetyucyeta,
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1578: etadvidhyabhāvehi pāṭhena nidhana evāniyamena hīṣādi prāpyeta //
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1579: tataśca vidhiphalasāmarthyādeva nidhanasthānakatvalābhaḥ, na tu pāṭhāt /
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1580: ataeva niyamāpekṣitapākṣikatvasiddhyarthaṃ kalpitāpi śrutiḥ sāmānyato yatkiñcitprayogavṛttisaubharīyanidhanasaṃbandhitayaiva kalpyata iti yuktam /
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1581: tayā hīṣādernityanaimittikaprayogaviṣayatvaṃ vṛṣṭyarthasaubhareca nidhanasthānakatvamiti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam //
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1583: yathaiva vāsiṣṭhānāṃ nārāśaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayāja ityatra vāsiṣṭhābhilaṣitaphalajanakadarśapūrṇamāsāṅgadvitīya- prayājadvārā vāsiṣṭhārthatvena nārāśaṃsamantravidhānamaṅgīkṛtam,
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1584: tadvadihāpi paraṃparāsaṃbandhena vṛṣṭyarthahīṣādiniyamavidhyupapatterna lakṣaṇāpīti pakṣāntaramāha --------- vastutastviti //
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1588_0: vṛṣṭau hīṣeva vijātīyasaubharadvārā kuryāditi niyamavidhyarthe phalite vṛṣṭyarthasaubharavidhāvapi
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1588_1: vṛṣṭyarthaṃ vijātīyānāṃ saubharāṇāṃ vikalpena prāptānāṃ hīṣnidhanakasyaiva saubharaviśeṣasya
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1589: nahi bhinnanidhanakasaubharasya vṛṣṭyādyarthatvena tādṛśaniyamāntarābhāve vṛṣṭau hīṣeveti niyamaḥ kathamapi saṃpādayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1592: ataśca yathaiva śiṣyācāryayoḥ saha bhojanaprāptau śiṣyasya kāṃsyabhojitvaniyamamaniyatapātrabhojyā- cāryo 'nurundhāno loke dṛśyata iti dvādaśādhikaraṇe kāṃsyabhojinyāye vakṣyate,
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1593: tena nyāyena vṛṣṭyarthasaubharavidhiraniyatasaubharagrāhyopi dvitīyaniyamamanurundhāno hīṣādinidhanaghaṭitasaubharaviśeṣameva gṛhṇātīti siddhaṃ niyamāntaramityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1594: kva tarhi śākhāntarasthasaubharasya niveśa ityapekṣāyāmāha ---------- ataśceti //
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1595: siddhānte saubharaphalāt vṛṣṭyādernātiriktaṃ vṛṣṭyādiphalaṃ hīṣādibhya iti prayojanaṃ vyatirekata eva jñātuṃ śakyamiti noktam //
GSP28jsbh2-2u:1597: iti kavimaṇḍana - khaṇḍadevaśiṣya - śaṃbhubhaṭṭaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāvyākhyāyāṃ prabhāvalyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //. //
